Package com.luna.common.io

Class FastByteBuffer

java.lang.Object
com.luna.common.io.FastByteBuffer
public class FastByteBuffer extends Object
代码移植自blade
快速缓冲，将数据存放在缓冲集中，取代以往的单一数组
Since:
1.0
Author:
biezhi, looly
